title: Factors in growth of worldwide population

content.question: All of the following factors contributed to significant growth in worldwide population from 1750 through 1900 EXCEPT

choices.label: introduction of Western Hemisphere food crops to new areas
new grain crops developed in the Green Revolution

content.answer: new grain crops developed in the Green Revolution

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
